name: RetrieveContactList
description:
Retrieve and filter a list of contacts from Zoho Books.

Use this tool to obtain a detailed list of contacts with options for advanced filtering by name, company, status, and more. Ideal for managing contact information and accessing financial data like outstanding amounts and credit limits. Supports pagination for efficient data handling.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: Provide the ID of the organization to retrieve relevant contact data.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: filter_contact_by_type
parameters.description: Filter contacts by type. Accepts 'customer' or 'vendor'.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by contact type. Allowed Values: customer, vendor.

parameters.name: contact_name_filter
parameters.description: Filter contacts by name. Use 'startswith' or 'contains' for match type. Max-length: 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by contact name. Max-length [100] Variants: contact_name_startswith and contact_name_contains. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: search_by_company_name
parameters.description: Search contacts by company name. Maximum length is 100 characters. Use variants like 'company_name_startswith' and 'company_name_contains' for different search methods.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by company name. Max-length [100] Variants: company_name_startswith and company_name_contains

parameters.name: primary_contact_first_name
parameters.description: Search contacts by the first name of the primary contact person. Use 'first_name_startswith' or 'first_name_contains'. Max-length 100.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by first name of the primary contact person. Max-length [100] Variants: first_name_startswith and first_name_contains

parameters.name: search_by_last_name
parameters.description: Search contacts by last name of the primary contact person. Supports 'startswith' or 'contains' options. Max-length 100.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by last name of the primary contact person. Max-length [100] Variants: last_name_startswith and last_name_contains

parameters.name: address_search
parameters.description: Search contacts by address field. Use 'address_startswith' or 'address_contains'. Max-length 100.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by any of the address fields. Max-length [100] Variants: address_startswith and address_contains

parameters.name: email_search_criteria
parameters.description: Search contacts by email of the primary contact person. Use 'startswith' or 'contains' in the string to specify the search variant. Max length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by email of the primary contact person. Max-length [100] Variants: email_startswith and email_contains

parameters.name: contact_phone_number
parameters.description: Search contacts by primary contact's phone number. Supports 'startswith' and 'contains' variants. Max length of 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by phone number of the primary contact person. Max-length [100] Variants: phone_startswith and phone_contains

parameters.name: contact_status_filter
parameters.description: Filter contacts by status. Options include All, Active, Inactive, Duplicate, PortalEnabled, PortalDisabled, OverDue, Unpaid, CreditLimitExceed, and Crm.

value_schema.description: Filter contacts by status. Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Inactive, Status.Duplicate, Status.PortalEnabled, Status.PortalDisabled, Invoice.OverDue, Invoice.Unpaid, Status.CreditLimitExceed and Status.Crm

parameters.name: search_contacts_text
parameters.description: Search contacts using contact name or notes. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search contacts by contact name or notes. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: sort_by_column
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort contacts by. Allowed values: contact_name, first_name, last_name, email, outstanding_receivable_amount, created_time, and last_modified_time.

value_schema.description: Sort contacts. Allowed Values: contact_name, first_name, last_name, email, outstanding_receivable_amount, created_time and last_modified_time

parameters.name: crm_contact_id
parameters.description: CRM Contact ID to filter specific contact details.

value_schema.description: CRM Contact ID for the contact.

parameters.name: crm_account_id
parameters.description: Specify the CRM Account ID for the contact to retrieve specific contact details.

value_schema.description: CRM Account ID for the contact.

parameters.name: crm_vendor_id
parameters.description: The CRM Vendor ID associated with the contact, used to filter results.

value_schema.description: CRM Vendor ID for the contact.

parameters.name: page_number_to_fetch
parameters.description: Specify the page number to be fetched. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: The number of contact records to fetch per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
